title: Navigate forwards to an expanded accordion header
instructions: Starting at the 'Personal Information' accordion header, navigate to the 'Billing Address' accordion header.

title: Navigate backwards to an expanded accordion header
instructions: Starting at the 'Billing Address' accordion header, navigate to the 'Personal Information' accordion header.

title: Navigate forwards to a collapsed accordion header
instructions: Starting at the 'Personal Information' accordion header, navigate to the 'Billing Address' accordion header.

title: Navigate backwards to a collapsed accordion header
instructions: Starting at the 'Billing Address' accordion header, navigate to the 'Personal Information' accordion header.

title: Request information about an expanded accordion header
instructions: Starting at the 'Personal Information' accordion header, read information about the accordion header.

title: Request information about a collapsed accordion header
instructions: Starting at the 'Personal Information' accordion header, read information about the accordion header.

title: Navigate into an accordion panel
instructions: Starting at the 'Personal Information' accordion header, navigate into the accordion panel.

title: Operate a collapsed accordion header
instructions: Starting at the 'Personal Information' accordion header, change its state to 'expanded'

title: Operate an expanded accordion header
instructions: Starting at the 'Personal Information' accordion header, change its state to collapsed
